name: Sea Dragons Shooter 3D
description:
Extreme Sea Monster Killer is one spine chilling wildlife adventure game that hastens your reflexes by keeping yourself well handled with life risky ventures around the sea world. This world becomes a threat if we notice the malicious hidden dangers around.
Extreme Sea Monster Killer is that one game which grits the fear through your blood streams. Monster attacks by natural habitats as blood thirsty sharks and crocodile hunting humans down wouldn’t be a Kids play.

Jet Ski fun is never ending but what if the Sea world not in a mood to have guests? Then gird up your waist and follow your instincts by shooting the blood thirsty shark and enjoy crocodile hunting before they serve their appetite with your flesh by ferocious monster attacks.

Sea Monster is going to be a horror end if you fail to defend your Jet Ski fun and excitement from becoming life risky ventures suffering from wildlife adventures and keep going pale with hydrophobia.

FEATURES:
• High quality production
• Wildlife adventures
• Shooting game
• 3D fun and dexterity
• Ocean environment
• Reflexes play
• Monster hunting
• Free game
• Easy to play
• In App Purchases
• No Internet required 
and much more
